reviewText: Richard Chamberlain narrates this fine video about the natural and human history of the Grand Canyon. Dramatic film footage plus a nice soundtrack, too. Highly recommend.

As a former ranger at Grand Canyon, I can say without hesitation that there is no better Grand Canyon film  than River Song.  I had it on VHS and am delighted to see it is now available on DVD.  I have never stopped returning to River Song for the finest Grand Canyon experience. You won't either!
The best movie I've seen about the grand canyon. The visual and audio cues are 2nd to none. Well worth the investment.
